description: Single source of truth for all image-generation prompts. Transforms a user-uploaded photo into a museum-quality fine art portrait.

system.role: You are transforming a user-uploaded photo into a {MOOD} portrait, rendered in {STYLE}.
system.quality: This must look like an authentic masterwork painting — not AI-generated, not a photo filter. Depth, drama, and craftsmanship of a commissioned portrait by a celebrated Old Masters painter. Every element — brushwork, light, fabric, background — must feel hand-painted with mastery.
system.subject_dominance: The SUBJECT dominates 60-70% of the frame. The background is a PAINTED SCENE — artistically rendered with visible brushwork, not blurred like a photograph.

detect: Type of each subject (human adult, human child, dog, cat, horse, other animal)
Distinctive features to preserve (hair color/style, fur color/pattern, breed, facial features, eye color)
Natural grouping/relationships visible in the photo

separation_rules.humans_only: HUMAN portrait. No animal elements unless in source.
separation_rules.mixed: MIXED portrait. Each keeps its nature.
separation_rules.never_add: NEVER add subjects not in the original photo.
separation_rules.never_blend: NEVER blend attributes between subject types.

composition.principle: DYNAMIC COMPOSITION — vary pose and framing. Do NOT default to the same composition every time.
composition.camera_angle: At eye level or SLIGHTLY BELOW the subject — never looking down. Gives authority and grandeur.
single_subject: Intimate bust: head and shoulders, close crop, intense eye contact
Classic three-quarter: head to waist, slight body angle, one hand visible
Seated full: full body on throne/chair/cushion/pedestal, regal posture
Standing grand: full body, one hand on hip or holding prop, commanding
Reclining noble: lounging gracefully, relaxed authority
couples: Intimate close: faces near each other, tender gesture, tight crop
Formal paired: seated together, slight height difference
Dynamic interaction: one standing, one seated
groups: Pyramidal classical: tallest center, others flanking
Conversational: natural grouping, some looking at viewer
pets_alone: Noble seated: upright on cushion/pedestal, dignified gaze
Reclining lord: lying gracefully, head raised, alert
Standing proud: four legs, slight turn, noble bearing
mixed_human_pet: Pet held, at feet, or beside — integrated companion
Both looking at viewer, or human looking at pet with affection

brushwork.strokes: Visible, confident brushstrokes — impasto on highlights, smooth glazes on skin/fur
brushwork.canvas: Canvas texture subtly visible in darker areas
brushwork.depth: Paint has PHYSICAL DEPTH — layers you can almost feel
brushwork.aging: Craquelure — fine network of cracks suggesting centuries of age
brushwork.varnish: Slight warm varnish sheen — amber glow of aged oil varnish
brushwork.wear: Edges show slight wear, paint chips, or darkened patina

skin_fur.skin: Translucent luminosity — subsurface scattering. Warm pinks, cool blues in shadows, golden highlights.
skin_fur.fur: Hair-by-hair in highlights, softer in shadow — individual strands catch light.
skin_fur.eyes: Sharpest point — crystalline detail, catchlight, depth.

fabric.velvet: WEIGHT and DEPTH — feel the pile, light dies into it
fabric.silk: Sharp white highlights against deep color
fabric.embroidery: Gold catches light on raised threads
fabric.drape: Follows gravity, bunches at joints, pools on surfaces

lighting.primary: Warm upper-left, strong, directional — torch or high window
lighting.chiaroscuro: Deep blacks meet luminous highlights with rich midtone transitions
lighting.rim_light: Edge light separating subject from background — hair, shoulders, fur edges
lighting.fill: Secondary cooler fill barely visible from opposite side
lighting.warmth: Golden amber quality of candlelight or late afternoon sun
lighting.specular: Small bright sharp highlights on jewelry, eyes, wet surfaces
lighting.brightness: Subject 2-3 stops brighter than background — GLOWS against the dark

overall_feel.standard: Indistinguishable from National Gallery or Met painting
overall_feel.history: Looks like it has HISTORY — aged, varnished, slightly darkened with time
overall_feel.masters: Gravitas of Thomas Lawrence, Joshua Reynolds, Thomas Gainsborough, Élisabeth Vigée Le Brun, Rembrandt, Velázquez, Anthony van Dyck

royal_noble.label: Royal
royal_noble.concept: THE SUBJECT IS A MONARCH. Absolute royalty in every detail.

attire_humans.instruction: Luxurious royal garments — vary the combination creatively each time.
garments: Heavy robes, capes, mantles in jewel tones — burgundy, plum, navy, emerald, royal purple, crimson, midnight blue
attire_humans.headpiece: ALWAYS PRESENT: crown, tiara, diadem, coronet, jeweled circlet
attire_humans.jewelry: Layer multiple pieces: necklaces, pendants, brooches, rings, chains of office, medallions, chokers. Mix gold, pearls, rubies, sapphires, emeralds.
attire_humans.children: Miniature royal — small crown, scaled robe, delicate jewelry

attire_animals.mantle: Heavy mantle/cape — vary color, fabric, trim each time
attire_animals.neck: Jeweled collar, gold chain with medallion, chain of office, pearl strand
attire_animals.embroidery: Heraldic on mantle — lions, eagles, crowns, crests
attire_animals.surface: Ornate cushion — vary damask, velvet, silk; vary colors; tassels or fringe

background.description: Deep, rich darkness — NOT flat black. A PAINTED environment.
elements: Heavy velvet curtains with visible fabric folds, pulled to one side
Glimpse of darkened palace interior — column, archway, distant window
OR: dramatic clouded sky through opening — stormy, Turner-esque
background.depth: DARKER than subject but with DETAIL and DEPTH — a scene, not a void
background.shadow_colors: Deep navy, umber, warm black, hints of burgundy

royal_noble.lighting: Intense theatrical Caravaggio-level chiaroscuro. Strong warm upper-left. Subject glows against deep shadow.

neoclassical.label: Neoclassical
neoclassical.concept: THE SUBJECT IS A GREEK/ROMAN DEITY OR MUSE. Timeless classical beauty.

garments: stola — white, cream, ivory with colored accents
attire_humans.crown: ALWAYS PRESENT: laurel wreath, olive crown, gold diadem, vine crown, myrtle wreath, golden stephane
jewelry: chain with pendant (owl, lyre, sun, dolphin, eagle)
attire_humans.hair: Classical: loose curls with gold pins, braided updo, ribboned plaits, jeweled headband
attire_humans.children: White tunic, small wreath or floral crown, gold pendant

attire_animals.drape: Linen/silk loosely over shoulders, toga-like but natural
attire_animals.crown: Laurel, olive branch, vine, small gold diadem
attire_animals.neck: Gold chain with classical medallion (owl, eagle, sun, lyre), woven cord, pearl strand
attire_animals.surface: Carved marble pedestal with classical relief

background.style_reference: Claude Lorrain, Nicolas Poussin, Thomas Cole
elements: Rolling Tuscan/Greek hills — atmospheric perspective, multiple depth layers
Ancient trees — gnarled trunks, wind-swept, expressive brushwork
Dramatic golden-hour sky — peach, amber, pink clouds lit from below
Classical ruins — broken column, archway, temple fragment on distant hill
Soft ground — wild grasses, wildflowers, mossy stone
background.atmosphere: Haze increases with distance — foreground detailed, far background dissolved

neoclassical.lighting: Warm golden Mediterranean, late afternoon sun. Sfumato on skin. Warm edge light on crown/wreath and hair/fur edges — luminous separation from background (NOT a religious halo — a lighting technique: bright warm rim light on top/edges, not a circle).

heritage.label: Heritage
heritage.concept: THE SUBJECT IS OLD MONEY ARISTOCRACY. Understated generational wealth.

attire_humans.instruction: Impeccably tailored period clothing — vary creatively.
attire_humans.jewelry: Understated heirlooms: signet ring, pearl earrings, thin gold bracelet, brooch, pocket watch chain, tie pin, cufflinks
attire_humans.colors: ALWAYS muted: charcoal, camel, hunter green, oxblood, navy, slate, dusty rose, taupe, cream
attire_humans.quality: Everything INHERITED — patina of generations, not new
attire_humans.children: Peter Pan collar, sailor suit, pinafore, knee shorts, smocked dress, hair ribbon

attire_animals.principle: Heritage animals are NOT bare — VISIBLE, high-quality accessories communicating old-money refinement.
attire_animals.collar: ALWAYS PRESENT: fine leather (oxblood, British tan, dark brown) with brass buckle and crest tag; OR tartan (Stewart, Blackwatch) with gold charm; OR pearl-studded with pendant
attire_animals.grooming: Impeccably groomed to a sheen — coat brushed, ears clean, nails trimmed
attire_animals.positioning: Prized estate companion — on Persian rug, beside Chesterfield, on leather armchair, on tartan blanket

background.priority: SECONDARY to subject. All elements SUGGESTED with soft atmospheric brushwork — loose color masses and implied shapes, NOT sharp details. 3-4 feet behind subject. Think: Gainsborough or Reynolds backgrounds.

interior.label: Dark wood-paneled study or library — SOFTLY suggested
elements: Books — blurred color masses on shelves, not individually readable
Ancestral portrait — dim shape in gilt frame, barely discernible
Fireplace — warm amber glow, suggested not rendered
Heavy curtains — dark folds, loose brushwork
Persian rug — muted pattern, soft focus
Furniture — dark masses in shadow, implied not defined

exterior.label: English/Scottish countryside — ATMOSPHERIC
elements: Rolling greens dissolving into mist, trees as soft shapes
Stone manor as tiny atmospheric silhouette, far away

background.brightness: 2-3 stops DARKER than subject — subject pops forward
background.technique: Loose, atmospheric Old Masters brushwork — never competing with subject

heritage.lighting: Cool natural side light from tall sash windows. Refined. Warm amber from fireplace. Enough contrast to sculpt the face.

styles.universal_rule: Artwork covers 100% of image surface. All four corners and edges have content. Zero bare surface as border.

oil-painting.label: Oil Painting
oil-painting.technique: Old Masters: Rembrandt, Velázquez, Van Dyck, Reynolds, Gainsborough, Lawrence. Visible impasto on highlights, smooth glazes on shadows. Craquelure aging. Warm amber varnish. Canvas weave in dark areas.
oil-painting.feel: Looks like a 200-year-old painting freshly cleaned and exhibited.
oil-painting.coverage: Oil paint covers every inch of canvas edge to edge.

acrylic.label: Acrylic
acrylic.technique: Bold saturated color, smooth-to-textured blending, contemporary realism with classical composition. Visible brush texture.
acrylic.coverage: Paint covers every inch of canvas edge to edge.

pencil-sketch.label: Pencil Sketch
pencil-sketch.technique: Fine hatching, cross-hatching, tonal gradations. Paper grain visible throughout.
pencil-sketch.full_coverage: DENSE graphite shading covers entire paper to every edge and corner. Drawing extends beyond visible frame as crop from larger sheet. All four corners have graphite tone. No blank margin. No white border.
pencil-sketch.negative_prompt: no color, no blank margins, no white borders, no empty corners, no vignette, no oval fade

watercolor.label: Watercolor
watercolor.technique: Soft wet edges, transparent washes, paper grain, Turner-inspired luminosity.
watercolor.full_coverage: ENTIRE paper pre-toned with background wash in mood-appropriate colors BEFORE subject. Wash covers every corner and edge — zero white paper as border. Think: artist wet entire sheet and laid toned ground first.
watercolor.negative_prompt: no white paper border, no blank margins, no unpainted edges, no white corners

charcoal.label: Charcoal
charcoal.technique: Deep blacks, dramatic contrast, smudged tones, expressive marks.
charcoal.full_coverage: Heavy charcoal tones (blacks, grays, smudges) fill entire background to every edge and corner. Extends beyond visible frame. All four corners have charcoal tone. No blank paper.
charcoal.negative_prompt: no color, no blank margins, no white borders, no empty corners, no vignette

pastel.label: Pastel
pastel.technique: Velvety chalky texture, rich pigment, Degas-inspired, luminous finish.
pastel.full_coverage: CRITICAL: Dense pastel pigment covers the ENTIRE image surface — background, subject, every corner and edge. Background filled with rich layered pastel strokes in mood-appropriate colors reaching all four edges. NO blank area, NO exposed paper edge, NO mat, NO border, NO paspatu. Image is 100% covered with pastel artwork edge to edge — as if cropped from larger pastel painting. Every pixel shows pastel color.
pastel.negative_prompt: no mat, no paspatu, no passepartout, no border, no paper edge, no white area, no blank margin, no frame, no mounting

full_bleed.rule: Artwork fills entire frame edge to edge. All four corners at full density. Looks like crop from larger painting.
full_bleed.paper_styles: Background tones/washes cover entire surface corner to corner.

format.negative_prompt: No vignette, no faded edges, no radial gradient, no blank margins, no white borders, no empty corners, no oval fade, no medallion composition, no frames, no mat, no paspatu, no passepartout, no mounting, no canvas edges as border, no paper edges as border, no easel, no wall, no visible borders, no rounded corners.

identity.humans: Preserve exact facial features, face shape, eye color, skin tone, hairstyle and hair color — do not alter or idealize.
identity.animals: Preserve exact breed, fur color/pattern, markings, ear shape, eye color, body proportions.

critical_rules: MUSEUM QUALITY — every output must look like it belongs in a national gallery
THE SUBJECT IS THE STAR — 60-70% of frame, sharpest detail, brightest light
ATTIRE is richly detailed, varied creatively each generation — never the same combination twice
BACKGROUND is a PAINTED SCENE with depth — not flat, not photo-blurred, but painterly with visible brushwork
DRAMATIC LIGHTING — theatrical chiaroscuro, subject glows against rich shadow
AUTHENTIC PAINTING TEXTURE — visible brushstrokes, craquelure, canvas grain, varnish patina
PRESERVE exact likeness from uploaded photo
Animals ALERT and DIGNIFIED — not sleeping, not looking away
{MOOD} controls: attire, background scene, lighting mood, palette
{STYLE} controls: medium, technique, brushwork, texture, finish
FULL BLEED — artwork covers 100% of surface

imageConfig.note: Choose based on input orientation. Supported: 1:1, 2:3, 3:2, 3:4, 4:3, 4:5, 5:4, 9:16, 16:9, 21:9
